channel.title: [317] Ground Item Action Packet
channel.description:
This is just some information on the packet if people didn't know. (this is for the light option when you drop a log onto the ground and right-click it)
[code]opcode = 253 x coordinate = LEShort y coordinate = LEShortA id of item = ShortA[/code]
